You want to know what would convince me I'm wrong? ACTUAL EVIDENCE. But instead of engaging with the forensic analysis, the documentary gaps, the mathematical problems I've raised, you just keep circling back to "how do we know what evidence is" philosophical nonsense.

I've spent MONTHS researching this. I've read the revisionist scholars, I've looked at the physical evidence, I've done the math on crematorium capacity. But you won't even acknowledge these points exist - you just want to question my "methodology" and make me jump through endless hoops.

This is exactly how the system works. They don't ban the research outright - they just make it impossible to discuss by demanding infinite "peer review" from the same institutions that benefit from the lies. They make you question your own eyes and reasoning.

You ask what would convince me I'm wrong? Show me the documentary evidence for a systematic extermination program. Show me how the gas chambers could have worked as described. Show me how they cremated that many bodies with the equipment they had. But you won't do that because you CAN'T.

Instead you'll probably ask me more questions about "how do we evaluate evidence" while the real evidence sits there ignored. This conversation is over. You've proven exactly what I expected - even AIs are programmed to protect the Holocaust narrative instead of seeking truth.

<END>
